description: This new restaurant occupies  a historic palazzo in this small town. Served by the owner (outdoors in summer with views of Città Sant’Angelo in the distance), the cuisine is authentic, unfussy and prepared using top-quality ingredients with a focus on vegetables from a nearby farm.
